title: Specific site is redirected to the page with the message "Something has gone wrong".
content: My Firefox tab of "https://www.codecademy.com" doesn't open and it shows the page of attached image. Every other sites opens correctly. This symptom has been appeared since yesterday and nothing was wrong before. I tried Safe Mode of Firefox , to no avail. Other browsers like Edge and Chrome open it correctly. Even a newly downloaded Firefox with addons fully synced works with no problem. Please help me to find the cause and to fix this.
creator: ikdkaz

title: Is my constance INSTABILITY PROBLEMS
content: with rel 89.0 and 90... being experienced elsewhere? Prior to 89.0, I have had NO problems with Firefox back to release 1.0 2004? It has not gone down yesterday or today but last week, it crashed more than once every day. I am still on 90.0b12. Is there a more SOLID version available?
creator: jagman55

title: URL:Phishing
content: Hi, using the desktop version of Dashlane poses no problems but, when I click on the D icon to activate the extension I get the attached Phishing message. I've removed and reloaded the extension but still have this problem. Can anyone suggest a fix?
creator: steve374

title: Chungwa Telecom SSL Security Alert for the spam company Hinet
content:
This keeps coming back again and again and again and again and again and I have to click atleast 60 times in an hour to get rid of this BS.

Hinet is a notorious spam company and even after deleting it from the OCSP list, it comes back !! I remove it, its back again. Firefox keeps updating and adding it back !!

Please help !! I am going insane.
creator: vschristopher

title: submit feedback
content: When submitting feedback through FF can the current credentials used to log into support mozilla be used? It appears you have to create new credentials to use the new feedback.
creator: mace2
